We've been working with @EnvAgency as part of a national effort to tackle catalytic converter thefts. 
This week we've:

☑  Visited 9 scrap metal dealerships thought to be unlicensed
☑  Planned distribution of marking kits 
☑  Helped communities protect their vehicles https://t.co/67QTaK7ekL
